events.message: We have received the application of John Doe for the Software Engineer position and have saved it to the candidate database for review.
John Doe's application has been categorized under Engineering due to his extensive experience as a software developer.
Recruiter Jane Smith has been assigned to manage the hiring process for John Doe's engineering application.
Completed the initial screening with John Doe. He demonstrated strong technical knowledge and problem-solving skills.
John Doe responded promptly to the interview invitation expressing enthusiasm for the Software Engineer role.
Scheduled the technical interview for John Doe on May 15th at 2 PM with our lead developer.
John Doe completed the technical interview and successfully solved all coding challenges presented.
HR interview has been scheduled with John Doe for May 18th at 10 AM to discuss company culture and benefits.
John Doe finished the HR interview and expressed strong alignment with company values and career goals.
An offer was proposed to John Doe for the Software Engineer position including a competitive salary and benefits package.
Received positive feedback from John Doe accepting the terms and eager to join the engineering team.
John Doe formally accepted the job offer and is excited to start contributing as a Software Engineer.
Onboarding process has begun for John Doe, including account setups and introductory sessions.
The hiring case for John Doe was officially closed after successful integration into the engineering team.
